Privacy Policy
• What kind of Private Information does City Stores mobile app collect?

1. Your names, gender, email address, mobile number (to send OTP for registration to be successful).

2. Your real time location information to bring all nearest malls to you.

3. Technical information about your device such as operating system information, hardware related info, mobile carrier info (if available).

4. Access to use media from phone for the purpose of adding profile image to user profiles.
• Why is this information collected?

a) Your City Stores account is associated to the City Stores app with the help of your mobile number. All vital functions such as browsing the app, checking out offers, customize search to be more useful to you and similar functions are reliant on the location the app receives thanks to your private details and mobile number.

b) Furthermore the required information is used to enhance City Stores team’s research activities for the purpose of increasing the effectiveness of our network and related Services, which then help us in developing new features for the City Stores community to make shopping a pleasurable experience.c) Also the contact information provided by you shall be used by City Stores to send you relevant app upgrade notices and sponsored promotions.

d) Please note that your acceptance to this privacy policy implies you give City Stores every right to contact you by SMS or e-mail for any such promotions or as required for the purpose improving the City Stores app or as needed

e) Effectiveness of mall and offer search as per the requirements of the user depends upon this information.

f) Required contact information is collected for availing offers and shall be used for future feature updates.
• Is My Information Shared with other parties?
No. We don’t share private information with third parties except those affiliated with the City Stores app and that too for promotion related activities.
• Determining mobile device location

Our Services are reliant on the location you provide, so in order for City Stores to provide you the best offers that are nearest to you we need to know your location.

Whenever you use the City Stores app the location information you provide or let us pick from your mobile device or browser (latitude & longitude details) is used to customize the mall shopping experience with respect to your current location (i.e., we'll show you a list of nearby malls, brands and shops).

City Stores app further uses your mobile device's ‘background location to provide notification updates about recent offers in malls or shops or brands that you have explicitly chosen as your favourite.
• Location Sharing on the City Stores app

Please be assured that your mobile’s real-time location is not shared with any mall/shop/brand or anyone on the City Stores app in a way to specifically identify you.\n\nThe location data is shared ONLY when you self decide to 'purchase'' an offer or book an offer from any of the shops/brands on the City Stores app who are all registered and verified merchants of the City Stores app hence nothing to worry about.
• Your Location History

City Stores App stores location history of your device to provide best offers at your beck and call. This information is critically private to the City Stores app and is never under any circumstances whatsoever shared with anybody.
